roleset.name: make longer, making longer in time
roleset.note: PROLONG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'prolong' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from prolong.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: There, Mr. Shevardnadze felt legitimized to unveil his own peace plan: The U.S.S.R. would prolong a suspension of arms shipments to Nicaragua after the February election if the U.S. did likewise with its allies in Central America.
example.arg: a suspension of arms shipments to Nicaragua
if the U.S. did likewise with its allies in Central America

example.name: with arg2, sorta
example.text: It does prolong the pain somewhat.''

example.name: start and end points
example.text: [John's stay in graduate school]-1 was prolonged *trace*-1 from five years to fifteen.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: Studies show that male fetal gender significantly predisposes to the prolongation of pregnancy.
